programme.desc: Marshall and Maria can't decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshall's homeland) or Cuba (Maria's homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: It is time to upsize! Daryl's client is moving away from downtown Toronto because they desire a bigger space, more privacy, & tranquility. They have 3 children between the ages of 7 & 13 who need their own bedrooms & the lady of the house needs an office since she works from home. Daryl knows all about tranquility & goes golfing with Mike to discuss his client & Mike's listing for them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jin's client lives a very active & busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business & pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elvira and Robert are looking for a home with a history, but want to make sure it is post-renovation.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: When Dana and Eric aren't busy with their successful family business, they have their hands full with their 4 children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Nathan, a start up company owner and his fiance Kelsey, a owner of a holistic nutrition company, are open to purchasing a house anywhere in the GTA.

programme.desc: Learn all about safety with Baby Shark Safety Rangers with fun and educational Safety Songs Compilation.

programme.title: Colors Song
programme.desc: Learn colors with Pinkfong! Join Pinkfong's journey to find the perfect color that matches Pinkfong!

programme.title: Learn ABC with Baby Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Learn ABC with Baby Shark
programme.desc: Juravenator, Alamosaurus, Mononykus, Albertosaurus, Iguanodon, Dilong, Eudimorphodon, Maiasaura, Carnotaurus

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs for Children
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Pinkfong Korean Traditional Songs
programme.desc: Baby Shark and Pinkfong meets beautiful traditional rhymes. Come listen to traditional Korean songs.

programme.title: Poki's Toy Lab
programme.desc: A genius inventor Poki makes toys to play with Pinkfong and Baby Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark Word Songs
programme.desc: Explore the world with our adorable friend Pinkfong as we sing, play and learn everyday words and phrases!

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs for Children
programme.desc: Learning words and names become easy with Pinkfong Word Songs.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs for Children
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Pinkfong Ten Little Kids
programme.desc: The adorable Ten Little Friends are here to sing and dance with you. One to ten!

programme.title: Christmas Coloring
programme.desc: Kids' all-time-favorite Learn Colors series are all geared up for the happy Christmas Season!

programme.title: Pinkfong Super Rescue Team
programme.desc: We Are The Pinkfong's Super Rescue Team! We solve all the problems in the town! Meet Roger the Police Car, Ready the Fire Truck, Forrest the Ambulance, Cloudia the Helicopter. Vroom Vroom, I am the Fire Truck Ready, dreaming of becoming a super-fire car! You're watching "Ready, the Fire Truck's Day", an educational and interactive Super Rescue Team series prepared to you by Pinkfong!

programme.title: Baby Shark Hospital Play 2
programme.desc: Welcome to Baby Shark Hospital, where Dr. Baby Shark will take care of you!

programme.title: Pinkfong Super Rescue Team
programme.desc: Hoi Poi Pinkfong! Pinkfong joins the Super Rescue Team! Join Pinkfong and the Super Rescue Team to solve all the cases happening in the city and learn essential safety tips along the way.

programme.title: Pinkfong & Hogi: New Friend Ninimo
programme.desc: One day, Pinkfong’s magical powers and memories of home planet Staria slowly start to disappear, and a mysterious cat named Ninimo appears! But even without the magical powers and memories, Pinkfong discovers the magic of friendship in Wonderville.

programme.title: Pinkfong & Hogi: New Friend Ninimo
programme.desc: One day, Pinkfong’s magical powers and memories of home planet Staria slowly start to disappear, and a mysterious cat named Ninimo appears! But even without the magical powers and memories, Pinkfong discovers the magic of friendship in Wonderville.

programme.title: Johny Johny, Yes Papa Play
programme.desc: Sing the 'Johnny Johnny, Yes Papa' song while playing with Pinkfong and Ninimo! Let's rescue Ninimo, who got caught by the villain while secretly snacking!

programme.title: Pinkfong I Love My School
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pinkfong I Love My School
programme.desc: Let's express our love to friends, teachers, and everyone at the school! Show your affection to everyone who shares the school experience with us.

programme.title: I Want to Play with Baby Shark
programme.desc: It's time to play with Baby Shark! What kind of games do you want to play?

programme.title: Pinkfong's Farm Animals
programme.desc: Welcome to Pinkfong’s farm! You're watching "Pinkfong’s Farm", fun and educational Animal Songs presented by Pinkfong! Learn all about different farm animals with all-new Pinkfong's Animal Songs!

programme.title: Baby Shark's WHY Songs
programme.desc: Why does poop come out? Why do loose teeth fall out? Let's find out about our bodies with Baby Shark!

programme.title: Bebefinn
programme.desc: "Baby Finn Learns Something New Everyday with the Funn Family! Here comes another beautiful precious day of Finn, a Baby Shark lover just as our children, and his Family. Enjoy the daily life of the Bebefinn Family filled with joyful songs."

programme.title: Hoi's Playground
programme.desc: Pinkfong and Baby Shark's awesome friend, Hoi, is back! With him, you'll find lots of fun songs and games! Let's have some fun with Hoi!

programme.title: Pinkfong Car Mechanic
programme.desc: Welcome to the Pinkfong Repair Shop. Feel free to drop by!

programme.title: Pinkfong Super Rescue Team
programme.desc: Hoi Poi Pinkfong! Pinkfong joins the Super Rescue Team! Join Pinkfong and the Super Rescue Team to solve all the cases happening in the city and learn essential safety tips along the way.

programme.title: Bebefinn Dance Time
programme.desc: Have fun dancing and singing with Bebefinn! It's dance time with mom and dad, or with siblings!

programme.title: Pinkfong and Hogi Mini-Movie: The Tricky Three Cars
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 Pinkfong & Hogi Mini-Movie: The Tricky Three Cars
programme.desc: Join Hogi on a fun-filled adventure! When the Tricky Three Cars take Pinkfong and Wonderstar friends away, it's up to Hogi to save the day! Follow Hogi on a thrilling journey of courage and friendship. Can Hogi bring the friends back home safely?

programme.title: Super Hero Baby Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Super Hero Baby Shark
programme.desc: Become a superhero and help Baby Shark and Daddy Shark defend the sea village! Use a variety of job tools to fight against the village villain, Thief Baby Shark. Will they be able to keep the peace in Sea Village?

programme.desc: Come join Baby Shark and Shark Family for a fun sing along!

programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits & headlines from the last year of the decade! It was the year the brand new Sony Walkman launched in Japan & Elton John performed 8 concerts in the USSR.

programme.title: The Best 1979 Party...Ever!
programme.desc: Blimey, what a year! Get ready to turn your telly up LOUD, with the greatest party anthems from '79 including Blondie, Queen, Abba, ELO, Roxy Music, Chic, Squeeze and more!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1979!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1979 & relive the closing days of disco & punk. Including Chic, Rose Royce, Michael Jackson, The Police & Ian Dury.

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1979
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1979
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1979 - a year that began with YMCA and ended with Pink Floyd! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1973
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1973
programme.desc: 30 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1973 - including Suzi Quatro, Donny Osmond & The Sweet! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: Glam Rock Night!
programme.desc: All night - rewind to a time of big hair, outrageous makeup and platform shoes. The greatest gems of glam pop & rock, including Alvin Stardust, Abba, Slade & Wizzard.

programme.desc: Harry and Bruce hit 24 spots in their hometown of San Francisco — from donuts and coffee to cocktails and BBQ.

programme.title: 24 Chicago Restaurants in 24 Hours
programme.desc: Harry and Bruce touch down in Chicago to hit 24 of the city's top restaurants in 24 hours.

programme.title: 24 Toronto Restaurants in 24 Hours
programme.desc: Harry and Bruce head North to Toronto to take down 24 of the city's top restaurants in 24 hours.

programme.desc: The Day of Gluttony takes over the Big Apple, as Harry and Bruce look for the best food and drinks in NYC.

programme.desc: The Day of Gluttony heads South as Harry and Bruce take on The Big Easy, and learn about Southern cuisine.

programme.desc: Chef and food-stylist Megan Mitchell takes you on a road trip to gorgeous locations and grills it up outdoors.

programme.desc: Chef Dale makes vegetables the main course with savory trumpet mushrooms and spicy ssam jang eggplant.

programme.desc: Chef Dale grills up a Mediterranean-inspired feast of beef and shrimp kabobs with tomatoes and pita.

programme.desc: Chef Dale says bon voyage to summer with a giant seafood feast of lobster, crab, clams, shrimp, and scallops.

programme.title: 4th of July Remixed
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale grills up his 4th of July favorites, like galbi smash double cheeseburgers and char sui bbq ribs.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings out brunch hits with Bacon Wrapped Dates, Cheesy Fried Rice, and BBQ Duck Pancakes.

programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, & grill up the biggest and best steaks out there.

programme.title: One Pot Meals

programme.title: The Pizza City You've Never Heard Of
programme.desc: George Kalivas goes on a mission to set the record straight about where to find the best pies on the planet.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, one brother will live like a king, while the other will check out the city’s street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Lion's Share of Lyon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: Pearls in Palawan
programme.desc: Erwan travels to the gorgeous island of Palawan where he meets with the locals and learns about pearl farming.

programme.title: Octopus in Isabela
programme.desc: In this episode, Erwan travels to the remote area of Palanan in Isabela, and learns how to catch an octopus.

programme.title: Mud Crab in Dumaguete
programme.desc: In Dumaguete, Erwan discovers their unique regional approach to catching mud crabs.

programme.title: Rainbow Runner in Apo Island
programme.desc: In Apo Island, Erwan meets environmentalists and learns about the Rainbow Runner fish.

programme.title: Fruit Bat in Mindoro
programme.desc: Erwan samples a traditional Filipino Adobo, made with an unlikely source of protein.

programme.title: Flying Fish in Batanes
programme.desc: In Batanes, known for its breathtaking coastline, Erwan sets out to catch dorado by using flying fish as bait.

programme.title: Smoked Pork in Sagada
programme.desc: In the mountainous region of Sagada, Erwan sets out to find out more about a local favorite smoked pork: Etag.

programme.title: World's Smallest Edible Fish in Bicol
programme.desc: Follow Erwan as he attempts to catch minuscule fish and see the many ways they can be prepared.

programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Lion's Share of Lyon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Jerkin' and GRILLIN'
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith is grillin’ and chillin’ serving up his favorite Jamaican dishes for his two friends.

programme.title: Happy Birthday to Me
programme.desc: It's Derrell's birthday and he’s treating himself to a lavish dinner inspired by a famous NYC steakhouse.

programme.title: Brunch Grows Up
programme.desc: Chef Derrell Smith hosts brunch with his famous ‘yelluh’ grit bowl bar with savory toppings and cocktail.

programme.title: Grandma Estelle
programme.desc: A special tribute to chef Derrell Smith’s grandma and her southern family recipes.

programme.title: Kendrick Nunn and Last Minute Game Day Grub
programme.desc: Derrell Smith & Kendrick Nunn cook some Last Minute Game Day Grub, perfect for basketball fans.

programme.title: Chiney Ogwumike Loves a Game Day Potluck
programme.desc: Derrell Smith invites Chiney Ogwumike to cook winning recipes for a slam dunk Game Day party!

programme.title: Vernon Davis and the Ultimate Game Day Spread
programme.desc: Derrell Smith invites Vernon Davis to help cook up the Ultimate Game Day Spread, sure to score a touchdown.

programme.title: Ricky Williams: Game Day Munchies
programme.desc: Derrell Smith & Ricky Williams cook up Game Day recipes to make you the real MVP at your next event!

programme.title: One Pot Meals
programme.desc: These delicious, mess-free one-pot meals mean minimal cleanup and maximum satisfaction.

programme.title: The Pizza City You've Never Heard Of
programme.desc: George Kalivas goes on a mission to set the record straight about where to find the best pies on the planet.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, one brother will live like a king, while the other will check out the city’s street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: I Did It All For Gnocchi
programme.desc: Join Chef Jason in the kitchen as he whips up a fun take on classic Italian gnocchi.

programme.title: Nick’s OG Fried Chicken, Biscuits and Fingerling Potato Salad
programme.desc: Chef Nick shows us his tricks for extra crispy fried chicken and flakey-af biscuits.

programme.title: Fancy Free
programme.desc: French food isn’t all fancy and expensive. Learn with Frankie classic dishes made with affordable ingredients.

programme.title: Going With the Grain
programme.desc: Learn how to prep ingredients to make delicious, healthy meals for a fraction of the time and cost.

programme.title: All About the Bread!
programme.desc: On this episode, we explore some of our favorite bread-themed recipes and learn some fun facts along the way!

programme.title: Comfort Food!
programme.desc: On this episode, it's time to get cozy as we feature some of our favorite Tastemade comfort food recipes!

programme.title: Fish & Chips and Hidden Veg Taco Cups
programme.desc: In this episode, we’re making a family classic: fish and chips, with a healthy twist so it’s perfect for kids. Then we ‘fight the fussy’ by tactically using veg to make sure your kids get their 5 a day, featuring special guest, Ciara Attwell.

programme.title: Fridge Raid Breakfast Frittatas and Mac and Squeeze
programme.desc: Nic and Ian knock up a nutritious breakfast that’ll get your kids fed and ready for a day of school, featuring special guest: Dy Rupy from The Doctor’s Kitchen. Then, they twist up a popular dish and create a no-rules, mac and squeeze- because there’s nothing better than home-cooked goodness.

programme.title: One Tray Bake and Hangry Hacks
programme.desc: Nic and Ian cook up a one pot wonder meal that’s simple, delicious and easy. Then they battle the hanger by cooking up some snacks which will keep your kids full and satisfied; featuring special guest, Charlotte Stirling Reed.

programme.title: Food for Thought and the Proof is in the Pudding
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll be exploring the foods that feed the belly and fuel the brain! Nic and Ian cook up some sweet treats that’ll perk up anyone’s school night dinner! Featuring guest chef, Selasi Gbormittah.

programme.title: Springtime
programme.desc: Spring is in the air and Chef Derrell makes lamb shanks with lemon couscous, a savory lamb curry and gyros.

programme.title: Break Up Meal
programme.desc: Chef Derrell serves up comfort and caters to the broken-hearted with lobster mac n’ cheese and tomato bisque.

programme.title: Party for Pennies
programme.desc: Frankie makes three dishes for a party of four. Then, it's a taco party for five people for only $20!

programme.title: An Eggplant Extravaganza
programme.desc: Frankie shows us how to shop for and cook this filling, delicious and cost-effective ingredient: the eggplant.

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: Frankie prepares an affordable and delicious sushi date night at home. That special someone will love it!

programme.title: Lunches for Work
programme.desc: Frankie shows us how to make five delicious lunches for the whole work week.

programme.title: The Holiday Specials
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Raw. Vegan. Not Gross.
programme.desc: Forget the calendar telling you when it's time for a holiday - there's always a reason to celebrate!

programme.title: Where My Germs At?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Raw. Vegan. Not Gross.
programme.desc: Laura teaches us about probiotics while showing us some raw vegan versions of traditional dairy-filled dishes.

programme.title: Pizza Party
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Raw. Vegan. Not Gross.
programme.desc: Laura makes cauliflower pizza and raw vegan "falafel," while Guy Turland joins her for a fun, spicy dessert.

programme.title: Field Trip

programme.desc: Laura adventures through Malibu with Guy Turland and excites our tastebuds with tomato soup & vegan pad thai.

programme.title: Zoodlin' Around
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Raw. Vegan. Not Gross.
programme.desc: Laura gets her hands on a spiralizer for some zucchini noodles and makes some raw energy balls.

programme.desc: Laura makes a trio of raw, vegan desserts, and shows you a recipe for raw vegan hazelnut pancakes.

programme.desc: Laura makes Borscht, a Russian beet soup, sneaks some snacks into the movie theater, and has a donut party.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 World Heritage Ancient Cities of Sri Lanka
programme.desc: The central plains of Sri Lanka are dotted with crumbling temples, lost cities and ruins of sacred Buddhist sites. It was here that ancient Sinhalese dynasties set up their capitals and supported massive artistic and architectural endeavors. Sigiriya, the ancient fortress atop a 66o-feet-high rock soaring out of a forest, and Polonnaruwa, the epitome of ancient Buddhist architecture, with its refined carvings, are but a few of the sites now ranking as national treasures.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina visits Ein Gedi oasis and Masada plateau on her way to Eilat, where she visits the beaches, Red Canyon and Wadi Shani.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Burn Appetit Zillertal, Austria
programme.desc: Located in the heart of the Austrian Alps' most highly glaciated section, Zillertal offers Jolly the thrills of winter in summer.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Food Fact Fun Vancouver Island, Canada
programme.desc: Alex is in Vancouver Island and calls for Saffron salmon at Modern Cafe. Next he visits “Red fish blue fish” a fish and chip shop and tries freshly prepared seafood. Further explores the Parksville beach for its sand sculptures and then explores a 50 year old Symphony Winery. Further Alex visits “Eagle wing whale watching” for fun and knowledge about the ocean life. To add to the adventure rush he tries motocross and then snorkels in cold waters of Nanaimo.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Burn Appetit Zillertal, Austria
programme.desc: Located in the heart of the Austrian Alps' most highly glaciated section, Zillertal offers Jolly the thrills of winter in summer.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Narlai & Jawai, India
programme.desc: The need for a short, refreshing break leads Asmita to a quaint hamlet in Rajasthan, where life has remained unchanged since the 15th century.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Burn Appetit Ziller Valley, Austria
programme.desc: On his way from Zillertal to Innsbruck, Jolly makes some rather fascinating pit-stops that lead him to uncover shades of Austria’s heritage.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Food Fact Fun Whistler, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts with Kangaroo meat pie in Whistler with a Australian ginger beer and continuing his food trail he visits Earls kitchen for a tuna dish. He then tries out e-biking and travels in the world’s highest cable car joining Blackcomb with Whistler mountain. Next, he visits Squamish lil’wat cultural center to learn about the Aboriginal people. Finally, he takes a tour of Pemberton valley on a horse, tries Canada’s highest zipline and bungee jumps over the Cheakamus river.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E52 Xp Guide Muscat, Oman
programme.desc: Muscat, the financial and business centre of Oman, flaunts a fine blend of tradition and modernity.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Burn Appetit Ziller Valley, Austria
programme.desc: On his way from Zillertal to Innsbruck, Jolly makes some rather fascinating pit-stops that lead him to uncover shades of Austria’s heritage.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Unwind Nikara Yala, Sri Lanka (ENG)
programme.desc: Indeya, in this episode unwinds in Sri Lanka at a nature resort. Here she visits a 2200-year-old Buddhist temple, later tries bodyboarding and explores the Yala National Park and its surroundings.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E33 Backpack Tel Aviv, Israel
programme.desc: Sabrina visits Israel and first explores Sarona, including its local market, and tries local food and wine. Her next stop is Jaffa exploring its flea market ending with Shakshuka Shushka.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Burn Appetit Vienna, Austria
programme.desc: In Vienna, Jolly chances upon a Baroque palace that houses mysteries of not only the world in which we live but also of the heavens above.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Montreal, Canada
programme.desc: Alex Drobin experiences the North American energy and European charm of Montreal as he explores all that the city has to offer.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: Burn Appetit

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina in Jerusalem, takes a guided tour of City of David and visits Western Wall, learning about its significance. Ending with Cardo and Mahane Yehuda Markets.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Milagros visits the ancient city of Cusco just in time for the legendary Inti Raymi Festival, a gateway to the Inca empire's beliefs. Hidden in the vibrant festivities, which continue into the night, are glimpses into the lives led by the people during the Inca era.

programme.title: Burn Appetit

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 World Heritage Ancient Cities of Sri Lanka
programme.desc: The central plains of Sri Lanka are dotted with crumbling temples, lost cities and ruins of sacred Buddhist sites. It was here that ancient Sinhalese dynasties set up their capitals and supported massive artistic and architectural endeavors. Sigiriya, the ancient fortress atop a 66o-feet-high rock soaring out of a forest, and Polonnaruwa, the epitome of ancient Buddhist architecture, with its refined carvings, are but a few of the sites now ranking as national treasures.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Food Fact Fun Vancouver, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts his Vancouver exploration by visiting Bridges restaurant where he tries smoked salmon pizza with some seafood. Then he visits the Richmond Night Market and then Treasure Cafe. Later visits the Steel Toad Brewery in Olympic Village. Next he explores the Gastown, including the steam clock. Further he explores the Hills Native Art ending with Vancouver observation deck. Next he rides on board the Grouse Mountain Skyride, ending with Capilano Suspension Bridge park.

programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: In Arequipa, Milagros has set out to peel back the layers of her country’s history.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Burn Appetit Graz, Austria
programme.desc: Set among the farms and vineyards of Styria, the city of Graz has quietly become the culinary crowning jewel of Austria.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Food Fact Fun Toronto, Canada
programme.desc: Alex Drobin gets to know the vibe of Toronto at significant spots such as Saint Lauren’s Market and Sir Henry’s Garage for Classic Cars.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina visits Acre, starting from El Jazzar mosque and Citadel fortress. Next day she travels to Mizpe Hayamim and then explores the town of Capernaum.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Great World Hotels The Residence (ENG)
programme.desc: Frieshia feels the magic of Mauritius through the unique blend of modernity and tradition offered at the luxury resort.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Amidst the sapphire expanse of Lake Titicaca, Milagros embarks on a journey of reconnecting with her roots. Delving into the secrets of the Uros, she unveils their timeless artistry in building floating islands, a testament to human resilience. But as she travels to Amantani Island, an enigma awaits—a forgotten temple, rituals that date back to the pre-Incan times, chapters of Peru’s lesser-explored history waiting to unfold.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Burn Appetit Alpbach, Austria
programme.desc: Jolly leaves behind the Styrian region and heads to the Alps, on his adventure across Austria, where gastronomy meets adrenalin.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Food Fact Fun Niagara, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts in Niagara with a 5 course meal along with enjoying dance performances near the Niagara falls. Next, exploring the urban space, he visits the Skylon town for a stunning view of the city. Further he visits the Niagara-on-the-lake village and explores its surroundings. He then interacts with a wine expert to learn more about the regional wines. Lastly, Alex is seen exploring the Niagara falls by helicopter, the a tunnel that takes him to the observation desk and then by ferry.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina is in Tiberias, known for its natural hot springs, here she visits the Sea of Galilee. In Nezareth she visits the cave of Mary, ending with Via Dolorosa in Jerusalem.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Great World Hotels Dieswaene (ENG)
programme.desc: Elisha gets some old-world style pampering at Die Swaene, a luxury boutique hotel situated in the heart of the historic center of Bruges.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Milagros visits the ancient city of Cusco just in time for the legendary Inti Raymi Festival, a gateway to the Inca empire's beliefs. Hidden in the vibrant festivities, which continue into the night, are glimpses into the lives led by the people during the Inca era.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Burn Appetit Rattenberg, Austria
programme.desc: Chef Jolly, a UK-based Indian chef, decides to combine his love for good food and passion for motorbikes on an epic trip across Austria.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Food Fact Fun Vancouver, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts his Vancouver exploration by visiting Bridges restaurant where he tries smoked salmon pizza with some seafood. Then he visits the Richmond Night Market and then Treasure Cafe. Later visits the Steel Toad Brewery in Olympic Village. Next he explores the Gastown, including the steam clock. Further he explores the Hills Native Art ending with Vancouver observation deck. Next he rides on board the Grouse Mountain Skyride, ending with Capilano Suspension Bridge park.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina in Jerusalem, takes a guided tour of City of David and visits Western Wall, learning about its significance. Ending with Cardo and Mahane Yehuda Markets.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 World Heritage Ancient Cities of Sri Lanka
programme.desc: The central plains of Sri Lanka are dotted with crumbling temples, lost cities and ruins of sacred Buddhist sites. It was here that ancient Sinhalese dynasties set up their capitals and supported massive artistic and architectural endeavors. Sigiriya, the ancient fortress atop a 66o-feet-high rock soaring out of a forest, and Polonnaruwa, the epitome of ancient Buddhist architecture, with its refined carvings, are but a few of the sites now ranking as national treasures.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina visits Ein Gedi oasis and Masada plateau on her way to Eilat, where she visits the beaches, Red Canyon and Wadi Shani.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Viajar Peru Inca Valley & Machu Picchu
programme.desc: Scaling rocks and defying heights, Milagros finds herself suspended 1200 feet above the ground at the Sacred Valley of the Incas.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Burn Appetit Zillertal, Austria
programme.desc: Located in the heart of the Austrian Alps' most highly glaciated section, Zillertal offers Jolly the thrills of winter in summer.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Food Fact Fun Vancouver Island, Canada
programme.desc: Alex is in Vancouver Island and calls for Saffron salmon at Modern Cafe. Next he visits “Red fish blue fish” a fish and chip shop and tries freshly prepared seafood. Further explores the Parksville beach for its sand sculptures and then explores a 50 year old Symphony Winery. Further Alex visits “Eagle wing whale watching” for fun and knowledge about the ocean life. To add to the adventure rush he tries motocross and then snorkels in cold waters of Nanaimo.

programme.title: Gearing Up
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 Gearing Up: Episode 1: Monster Jam and Dubai Powerboats
programme.desc: Monster Jam action kicks off this episode and the year! With every new year, Monster Jam fans have great hopes for what the seasoned drivers will do, and which up-and-coming talent will take centre stage. Some of the most well-known powerboating drivers journey around the globe each year to compete in the XCAT World Championship, giving it their best at each of the competition's locations. The conclusion of every season is eagerly awaited by sports fans.

programme.sub-title: S2024 : E08 Super Formula: Round 8: Suzuka

programme.title: Autosport
programme.sub-title: S00 : E02 Ranking Autosport's Top 50 Drivers of 2024 - 40 to 31
programme.desc: In this episode, we look at the drivers ranked from 40th to 31st place, featuring drivers from F1, F2, the BTCC, Formula E and the world of Sportscars!

programme.title: Pikes Peak - The Mountain Decides
programme.desc: Renowned documentary film maker Jeremy Hart shows us the challenges faced from the Pikes Peak International Hillclimb, one of racing's toughest tests against the clock - featuring the recording-breaking Volkswagen I.D. R Pikes Peak.

programme.title: Belgian Rally Championship
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E06 BRC: Round 6: Ypres Rally
programme.desc: The 59th Ardeca Ypres Rally, the sixth round of the Belgian rally championship, remained exciting until the absolute final phase. The pace was particularly high at the front, which caused a lot of slips and mistakes. Even the winner did not remain flawless. Yet Stéphane Lefebvre was clearly the fastest. The 32-year-old Nordist, who as a child was a fascinated spectator watching the rally cars in Ypres, won with a lead of 40″46 over Maxime Potty, while Cédric Cherain finished third.

programme.title: Porsche Cup Brazil
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 Porsche Cup Brazil: Round 2: Velocitta - Race 1
programme.desc: Watch race 1 of the second round of the 2025 Porsche Carrera Cup Brasil season at Autódromo Velocitta.

programme.title: Why the Mercedes CLRs kept taking off at Le Mans 1999
programme.desc: Mercedes' most recent appearance in the Le Mans 24 Hours will forever be famous for the sight of its cars taking to the air. 20 years on from the 1999 event, which Mercedes eventually withdrew from following its third airborne accident of the week, Chain Bear explains in great detail the factors behind the design of the spectacular-looking CLR that were ultimately the three-pointed star's downfall

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 1
programme.desc: Anniversary base camp / Jungfraujoch (Switzerland)On 3 August 2011, exactly 200 years after the first ascent, the Swiss mountain sports outfitter Mammut will be organizing the biggest summit project in the history of mountaineering on the “Top of Europe”...

programme.title: FAI - World Indoor Skydiving Championships - Montréal (CAN)
programme.desc: More than 200 competitors from 23 countries converged on the SkyVenture wind tunnel near Montreal to compete in eight different classes at the 2nd FAI World Indoor Skydiving Championships.

programme.title: World Rookie Tour 2106/17 - Part 1 - Italy
programme.desc: The World Snowboard Federation (WSF) is the international organization exclusively working to develop the sport of snowboarding at all levels, especially with worldwide events four young and talented riders.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: MIT100 - Triathlon Mauritius

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024
programme.desc: MotoSurf World Championship in Croatia: This year, when the championship hosted the qualification for the World Games as part of the Championship, 109 racers representing 21 different countries and 3 continents competed in Zadar.

programme.title: Profile Marcel Remy - On top of Miroir de l´Argentine
programme.desc: It is his favorite route: the 450 meter north-west face of the famous Miroir de l’Argentine. For more than the 200th time, Marcel Remy, father of Yves and Claude Remy, climbs this classic peak with his sons on August 22, 2017. At the age of 94.

programme.title: Kaunertal Opening - Ski&Snowboard Slopestyle (AUT) & Grand Prix Beroun - Skateboard (CZE)
programme.desc: Snowboarding & Freeskiing: classic opening into new winter season and Skatebording

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Back Country Freestyle Challenge
programme.desc: Back to the third episode of the New Zealand Winter Games 2023! This time, we dive into the exhilarating world of Back Country Freestyle, where athletes shows their skills in the untouched winter landscapes in the southern Alps of New Zealand. Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure!

programme.title: Gold Coast Marathon 2024
