programme.title: So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.desc: The trailer cleverly edited has been aired with the scenes only seemed Hoo Joon is like bullied by Geunyoung.

programme.title: So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.desc: Inhyung has joined as Hoo Joon's partner in his commercial shoot and JJ heard this situation belatedly.

programme.title: So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.desc: After the show premiered, Geunyoung is branded as a national anti-fan due to the intended way of editing.

programme.title: So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.desc: Geunyoung attends the photo wall shooting event with Hoo Joon, and she gets to be humiliated by his fans.

programme.title: So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.desc: Geunyoung encounters her ex-superior Moonhee who had been intercepting her project for a long time.

programme.title: So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.desc: Hoo Joon tells Geunyoung about his past and secrets one by one, and he confesses his sincerity.

programme.title: So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.desc: Hoo Joon rushs to the hospital after hearing Inhyung was fallen down. The situation makes Geunyoung bothering.

programme.title: So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.desc: Geunyoung becomes a target to Hoo Joon's fans and even his anti-fans after the accidental kiss scene.

programme.title: So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.desc: JJ feels Inhyung growing apart from him, and feels Geunyoung also seemed to avoid him after the ring issue.

programme.title: So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.desc: JJ forces Hoo Joon to move into his company using Geunyoung as bait and Hoo Joon gets mad.

programme.title: So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.desc: Hoo Joon holds a press conference to open all the things but the response is not that friendly.

programme.title: So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 So I Married The Anti-Fan
programme.desc: Geunyoung gets to have an interview to prove his innocence and to dispel the fake articles on Hoo Joon.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: A rich playboy Jin Wook starts work in his father's resort as a bellhop. He keeps encounter Yoo Mi.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: After spending a night with Jin Wook, Yoo Mi run away from him. 3 years later, she becomes a nutritionist.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi struggles to meet the unreasonable demands of her boss.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi brings a meal to Jin Wook’s office and she encounters him with Hye Ri. Hye Ri is jealous of Yoo Mi.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi takes Dong Goo to Jin Wook’s house and Dong Goo accidentally breaks an expensive jewelry box.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Jin Wook makes Yoo Mi work overtime to prevent Yoo Mi from spending time together with Hyeon Tae.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi agrees to pay for the jewelry box and medical fees by having dinner with Jin Wook ten times.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi goes to Jin Wook’s house to cook a meal and just about to sit down to eat, Jin Wook’s father drops by.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi and Jin Wook stay at one of the company’s resorts. Meanwhile, in Seoul, Hye Ri visits Hyeon Tae.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: When Dae Bok sees Jin Wook playing with Dong Goo, he thinks that Yoo Mi and Jin Wook had a child.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Hye Ri harasses Yoo Mi. Meanwhile, Dae Bok visits Yoo Mi’s home to find out if Dong Goo is his grandchild.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: After she quits her job, Yoo Mi moves to Daejeon to work at a university. Hyeon Tae comes to visit her.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi blames her mom for her misfortune and goes to the beach where she first met Jin Wook.

programme.title: My Secret Romance
programme.desc: Yoo Mi disappears the next morning, but Jin Wook decides to wait until whenever she comes back.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In finds out that his grandfather revised his will and the inheritance condition is to marry Da Hyeon.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon can't trust Jae In, and she is not interested in marriage. So, he makes a new suggestion to her.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In and Da Hyeon sign a contract to date for six months. But they are so different to date each other.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon finds out Jae In's colorful history of dating and she got angry as she remembers the kiss with him.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon heard Jae In said Da Hyeon is not special. Da Hyeon, who got hurt in pride, prepares to revenge.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: An urgent matter comes up to Jae In and Da Hyeon waits for him. They missed each other as their paths crossed.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: On Jae In's birthday, Da Hyeon prepares a special gift. Meanwhile, a man approaches Da Hyeon.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon's house was robbed. Jae In is anxious to leave her alone, he brings her to his house.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon attend Jae In's event and she meets Ju Hee, who was almost engaged with Jae In.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In had a scandal with Ju Hee while the termination date of his contract with Da Hyeon is getting closer.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Da Hyeon has decided to attend the group’s anniversary event to meet Jae In’s grandfather.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Ju Hee is jealous at Jae In's love for Da Hyeon. She plans to separate Da Hyeon from Jae In.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Ju Hee visits Da Hyeon and apologizes for the kidnapping, but Da Hyeon still suffers from the after-effects.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In, who suddenly took over the company, naturally moved away from Da Hyeon, and they miss each other.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In tries to forget Da Hyeon, but he runs to Da Hyeon's house after seeing Da Hyeon meeting another man.

programme.title: 1% of Something
programme.desc: Jae In proposed to Da Hyeon, married after many twists and turns and lived happily as a married couple.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Cheon Gi, a blind girl, meets Ha Ram, who was on his way to a ritual. During the ritual the Devil gets loose.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Cheon Gi becomes a painter who paints imitation and sells them for money to buy medicine for her father.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: After helping Cheon Gi and accidentally making physical contact, the demon inside Ha Ram wakes up.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Cheon Gi’s father collapses so she decides to participate in Maejukheon Painting Contest to save her father.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Cheon Gi fails the first round but gets a free pass from Han Geon because he’s sure she’s a blessed painter.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Cheon Gi and Ha Ram go on a stroll and end up kissing which almost wakes up the Demon inside Ha Ram.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Cheon Gi wins the contest and she decides to go to Gohwawon to find the truth about her father’s madness.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Cheon Gi enters Gohwawon to start working and the late King’s portrait later calls the demon inside Ha Ram.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Ha Ram finds out about the demon inside him and Cheon Gi finds out why she was chosen to restore the portrait.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Cheon Gi finds out that if she paints the portrait, something bad might happen to her like her father.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Ha Ram gets arrested under the suspicion of killing the soldiers and Cheon Gi continues to draw the portrait.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Cheon Gi starts repainting the portrait and King Seongjo tells Prince Yangmyeong he is the next Crown Prince.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Ha Ram realizes the ring he gave to Cheon Gi is the divine object and gives Prince Joohyang a fake ring.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: Prince Joohyang uses Cheon Gi’s father to lure her out and Cheon Gi's father dies being hit by a poison arrow.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: With the help of Ha Ram, Cheon Gi gives her father a proper burial and Ha Ram finds out the Demon inside him.

programme.title: Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Lovers of the Red Sky
programme.desc: The Demon is finally sealed in the painting, Ha Ram and Cheon Gi get married and live happily with their son.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: 1958, Gangwondo. When bumped into the mermaid trapped in small pond, Dam Ryeong releases her into the sea.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae and the mermaid somehow start to live together but the two soon get chased by gangsters at Spain.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: The mermaid starts a tough journey to Seoul to keep her promise with Joon Jae.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Feeling a deja vu, Joon Jae helps the mermaid to get out of the aquarium and the two see fireworks together.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae wonders why he has a slight sense of deja vu to the mermaid, Sim Cheong.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae panics when heard Sim Cheong went to the emergency room but Chi Hyeon says it was just an accident.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae loses his memory of the time he spent with Sim Cheong at Spain. Dong Pyo looks for clues of murder.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae gets confused of his feeling to Sim Cheong. He recalls Yang Seung Gil when ran into Ma Dae Young.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae finds out that Ma Dae Young was the one who had threatened him and was looking for Sim Cheong.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae wonders the meaning of the messages that Dam Ryeong sent through his dream.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Jeden po Drugim
programme.desc: Na granicy Teksasu i Meksyku, podczas wojny secesyjnej, pułkownik Greyson został oskarżony o zdefraudowanie 500 000 dolarów, które miał dostarczyć dowództwu Konfederacji.

programme.title: Szalony Pies Morgan
programme.desc: Prawdziwa historia irlandzkiego banity Daniela Morgana, który jest poszukiwany, żywy lub martwy, w Australii w latach 50-tych XIX wieku.

programme.title: Apaczka
programme.desc: Tommy jest niewinnym oficerem kawalerii, który zakochuje się w pięknej kobiecie Apaczów (Yara Kewa) po uratowaniu jej od paskudnego przemytnika broni o imieniu Honest Jeremy.

programme.title: Buntowniczka
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, której rodzina jest sprzymierzona z osławionym Williamem Quantrillem, staje się banitką. Ann pragnie zemścić się na Indianinie, który zabił jej brata.

programme.title: Niekończąca się Masakra
programme.desc: Szeryf zawieszony za nadmierną brutalność walczy ze skorumpowanymi władzami i bandytami.

programme.title: Jack Błyskawica
programme.desc: Błyskawica Jack Kane jest australijskim banitą na dzikim zachodzie. Podczas nieudanego napadu na bank bierze na zakładnika niemego Bena Doyle'a. Dwójka staje się dobrymi przyjaciółmi, z Jackiem uczącym Bena jak obrabiać banki, podczas gdy oni planują ostatni skok Jacka.

programme.title: Kasztanek
programme.desc: Chłopiec z rancza dostaje kucyka. Chłopiec go kocha, ale ten ucieka. Zaczyna się niespodziewana i tragiczna w skutkach historia.

programme.title: Buckaroo - Winchester Nie Wybacza
programme.desc: Gdy dyliżans, którym podróżuje niejaki Lash, zostaje zaatakowany przez gang Monteiro, Lash zabija jadącego z nim przyjaciela i wspólnika. Dlaczego? Żeby zabezpieczyć swoje bogactwo...

programme.title: Wielki Skarb
programme.desc: Ślepy mężczyzna chce ukraść złoto samozwańczego gubernatora stanu Chihuahua. Nie może tego zrobić sam, więc najmuje do tego zadania czterech oszustów.

programme.title: Rewolwer za Sto Trumien
programme.desc: Po powrocie z wojny secesyjnej Jim Slade odkrywa, że jego rodzice nie żyją na farmie.

programme.title: Legenda o samotnym jeźdźcu
programme.desc: Młody Strażnik Teksasu John Reid jako jedyny przeżywa zasadzkę zorganizowaną przez przywódcę renegatów Bartholomew "Butcha" Cavendisha. Przeżyć pomaga mu stary przyjaciel z dzieciństwa Komancz Tonto. Kiedy John dojdzie do siebie i wyliże rany, poświęci życie walce z przestępczością. John Reid stanie się zamaskowanym bohaterem zachodu, Samotnym Jeźdźcem. Z pomocą Tonto dwójka bohaterów wyrusza na ratunek prezydentowi Ulyssesowi S. Grantowi, gdy Cavendish bierze go za zakładnika. Dowiadujemy się, że Cavendish był oficerem w armii Stanów Zjednoczonych, zanim stanął przed sądem wojennym i został niehonorowo zwolniony.

programme.title: Nadchodzi Durango, Płać Albo Giń
programme.desc: Windykator wplątuje się w niebezpieczną sytuację, gdy skorumpowany biznesmen, dla którego odzyskał 100 000 dolarów, nie chce mu zapłacić zwyczajowego procentu za jego usługi.

programme.title: Rewolwerowiec z Jalisco
programme.desc: Salvador kocha się w pięknej Marii, niestety jej ojciec nie akceptuje ich związku.

programme.title: Żadnych Grobów na Cmentarzu
programme.desc: Jerry, Reno i Paco trafiają do więzienia, gdzie spotykają młodego Meksykanina, który twierdzi, że został skazany za przestępstwo, którego nie popełnił.

programme.title: Nadchodzi Sabata
programme.desc: Sabata i Mangosta to rabusie. Po napadzie na bank i w wyniku serii niefortunnych wydarzeń, nawiązują współpracę z pracownikiem tegoż banku, Peterem. Rabusie uciekają, ale na ich drodze staje szef Petera i wynajęci przez niego rewolwerowcy.

programme.title: Dni Przemocy
programme.desc: W ostatnich miesiącach wojny secesyjnej brat Joego zostaje niesprawiedliwie zabity przez Clifforda, kapitana armii północnej. Joe postanawia dołączyć do grupy południowców zdeterminowanych, by stawiać opór do końca.

programme.title: Poker z Rewolwerami
programme.desc: Po przegraniu wszystkiego w pokera i zaciągnięciu długu, Lucas zgadza się dostarczyć wóz do miasteczka Chamaco za 5000 dolarów zapłaty. Wkrótce wpada w wielkie tarapaty z bandytami, lokalnym bossem miasta i piękną pracownicą saloonu.

programme.title: Porachunki Rewolwerowców
programme.desc: Tajemniczy nieznajomy pojawia się, by dokonać przerażającej zemsty na byłych konfederackich oficerach, którzy podczas wojny secesyjnej zdradzili i byli odpowiedzialni za masakrę swojego oddziału.

programme.title: Zachód słońca nad Kolorado
programme.desc: Ranczer pomaga przyjacielowi odzyskać odziedziczone pole, ale zostaje oskarżony o jego morderstwo.

programme.title: Ogród zła
programme.desc: Trzech Amerykanów otrzymuje propozycję: za 2000 dolarów mają uratować męża kobiety uwięzionego w kopalni złota w górach Meksyku. W trakcie podróży każdy z nich kalkuluje szanse na zdobycie kobiety lub kopalni, o ile przeżyją tę niebezpieczną misję.

programme.title: Zabójstwo za Sto Tysięcy Dolarów
programme.desc: Łowca nagród Johnny Forest stara się spełnić prośbę umierającej matki - ma sprowadzić swojego wyjętego spod prawa brata Clinta żywego do domu.

programme.title: Wielebny Colt
programme.desc: Do Tucson przybywa wielebny Miller z planem budowy kościoła. W dniu jego przyjazdu zostaje obrabowany bank. Mieszkańcy Tucson, podejrzliwi wobec nowego wielebnego, bo ten nosi przy sobie broń, natychmiast obwiniają go o napad.

programme.title: Generał Custer
programme.desc: Generał Custer - Miłość George'a Armstronga Custera do bohaterskich tradycji Kalwarii i niechęć do nadchodzącej industrializacji doprowadziły go do przeznaczenia pod Little Big Horn.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: Yuma to western z 1971 roku, z Clintem Walkerem w roli głównej, wyreżyserowany przez Teda Posta i nakręcony w Old Tucson. Film był pierwotnie pilotem telewizyjnym, który pojawił się w programie ABC Movie of the Week.

programme.title: Dobrze Jest Ufać... Ale Lepiej Strzelać
programme.desc: Napad nie udaje się z powodu śmierci przywódcy bandytów. Trzech rabusiów próbuje uzyskać łup. Wieść się rozchodzi i inni dołączają do walki o gotówkę.

programme.title: Nagroda Jest Twoja... Człowiek Mój
programme.desc: Grupa zabójców poszukuje rewolwerowca El Puro, by zdobyć 10 000 dolarów nagrody.

programme.title: Viva! Django
programme.desc: Django jest na tropie bandytów, którzy zgwałcili i zabili jego żonę.

programme.title: Może Bóg ci wybaczy... lecz nie ja
programme.desc: Kiedy Cjamango jest z dala od swojego rancza, sześciu bandytów atakuje i zabija wszystkich członków jego rodziny.

programme.title: Nienawidź Bliźniego Swego
programme.desc: Ken szuka sprawiedliwości dla swojego brata Billa, który został zabity przez rewolwerowca o imieniu Stevens. Stevens kłóci się z gangsterem Malone'em o mapę do kopalni złota. Między trzema mężczyznami rozpoczyna się śmiertelnie niebezpieczna gra w kotka i myszkę.

programme.title: Wielki Pojedynek
programme.desc: To klasyczny film spaghetti western z 1972 roku w reżyserii Giancarlo Santi, który wcześniej pracował jako asystent reżysera Sergio Leone przy filmach "Dobry, zły i brzydki" oraz "Pewnego razu na Zachodzie". W filmie występuje Lee Van Cleef jako szeryf, który szuka sprawiedliwości dla człowieka oskarżonego o morderstwo.

programme.title: Trumna Pełna Dolarów
programme.desc: Na granicy z Meksykiem trwa frontierska waśń. Bracia banity Hagena zostali zabici przez rodzinę Nevada's Kida.

programme.title: Kula Dla Generała
programme.desc: Banda meksykańskich handlarzy bronią, zatrudnionych przez rewolucyjnego generała, przyjmuje do swojego gangu Amerykanina, nie wiedząc o jego intencjach.

programme.title: Masakra w Wielkim Kanionie
programme.desc: Odnalazłszy zabójców swojego ojca Wes Evans wraca do domu, gdzie zostaje uwikłany w krwawy spór o ziemię.

programme.title: Martwi ludzie
programme.desc: Na bezprawnym Starym Zachodzie, dwóch braci wyrusza w pełną niebezpieczeństw podróż. Ich celem jest pomszczenie śmierci ojca, ochrona plemienia Apaczów, które kochają, i odzyskanie należnych im ziem oraz złota. W trakcie wyprawy będą musieli zmierzyć się z licznymi zagrożeniami i trudnymi decyzjami, a ich więź braterska zostanie wystawiona na próbę.

programme.title: Przeklęte Rewolwery z Dallas
programme.desc: Wyjęty spod prawa Szybkoręki (Álvarez) napada na dyliżans, którym podróżuje Clay Stone (Beir), piosenkarka Katy Dior (Marandi) i hazardzista Fred Foster (Mathot). Stone będzie szukał zemsty.

programme.title: Dolina Zemsty
programme.desc: Synowie barona bydła z Kolorado, jeden biologiczny, a drugi adoptowany, żywią do siebie urazę i walczą o kontrolę nad imperium ojca.

programme.title: Utah Blaine
programme.desc: Utah Blaine ratuje od śmierci Joe'go Neal'a. By się odwdzięczyć Joe zatrudnia Utah jako zarządcę swojego rancza. Na początku Utah pomaga tylko jego kolega rewolwerowiec, ale stopniowo zjednuje sobie mieszkańców miasteczka. Kulminacją wydarzeń będzie starcie z Russ'em Nevers'em i jego poplecznikiem Rink'em Witter'em oraz ich bandą złoczyńców.

programme.title: Piekielny Posterunek
programme.desc: Weteran wojny w Korei próbuje pomóc właścicielowi kopalni w małym miasteczku w rozwoju kopalni wolframu, pomimo wysiłków szefa miasta, aby go powstrzymać

programme.title: Pojedynek Kogutów
programme.desc: Dwóch oszustów niszczy lokalną gospodarkę małego miasteczka, które odwiedzają... ale potem zakochują się w dwóch młodych kobietach spokrewnionych z bogatymi właścicielami ziemskimi, którzy są celem ich głównego oszustwa.

programme.title: Szlak do Santa Fe
programme.desc: W 1854 roku Jeb Stuart, George Custer i inni absolwenci West Point zostają oddelegowani do Kansas, aby pomóc w pacyfikacji terytorium przed wznowieniem budowy linii kolejowej do Santa Fe.

programme.title: Raiders of Red Gap
programme.desc: Bob's Playin' A Mystery Hand... He's Marked For Death By Killer Bullets As Gunfire Echoes Over The Plains! After one of his ranch hands is killed when a gang attacks his ranch, Jim Roberts joins forces with his neighbor in an effort to fight off the Bennett Cattle Co., a company looking to rob them of their land. Things get increasingly dangerous as the company hires Butch Crane, a professional killer, to stop them. Directed by Sam Newfield (Racing Luck (1935), Go-Get-Em, Haines (1936)), Raiders of Red Gap stars Robert Livingston (The Three Mesquiteers (1936), Larceny on the Air (1937)) as Rocky (Lone Rider) Cameron and Al St. John (Billy the Kid Trapped (1942), Border Feud (1947)) as...

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: Young Bill Hickock
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars as the title character in this actionpacked feature from Republic Pictures. Starring Sally Payne as Calamity Jane, and Rogerss ongoing sidekick George Gabby Hayes, this twofisted saga relives some of Americas most colorful days, and also has time for a few musical numbers, including Up and Down the Prairie, and When the Shadows Fall Across the Rockies.

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRC's Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: Revenge of the Virgins (Edited Version)
programme.desc: The angry and topless female members of a Native American prepare for battle when white treasure hunters move in on their sacred ground. Peter Perry Jr. (The Secret Sex Lives of Romeo and Juliet) directed this early nudie-cutie from a script by legendary cult filmmaker Ed Wood (Plan Nine from Outer Space). Writing under the pen name Peter LaRoche, Wood churned out this screenplay just before he reinvented himself as the author of seedy adult novels.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Retired U.S. Deputy Marshall Denver McKee struggles to find the suspects responsible for stolen cattle and murdered ranchers.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright gives a strip of fertile farming land to an Indian who had previously saved Bens life. Things take a deadly turn, however, when the land ends up being next to a very racist farmer.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe's date, Jennifer, is abducted and held for ransom at the circus. He and Hoss search the circus for her, facing a tough crowd of carnies in their search.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Gunnar, a long-lost relative of the Cartwright family, arrives in Ponderosa, where the family takes him in for the night. Unknown to the Cartwrights, however, is Gunnars leading of The Comancheros, a dangerous band of criminals. After Little Joe and his girlfriend are kidnapped by The Comancheros, the Cartwrights and Gunnar must work things out.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright unknowingly hires outlaw Johnny Logan to help him with his cattle drive. Logan, going by the name Sam Jackson, joined with a plan to kill the sheriff of a nearby town.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Adam gets hurt while saving a woman from a group of indians, the woman must nurse Adam back to health as the rest of the tribe sets out to find her.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to convince two rich women that Shady Rest is a farm. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Guy Scarpitta..Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aried in February of 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Very Old Antique
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) tries to sell the Cannonball to a rich man as an antique.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spur Line to Shady Rest
programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quick Hide the Railroad

Bedloe: Charles Lane. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The President Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel with the intention to terminate the Cannonball's service. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse

Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kate's intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets

Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction

Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Kate's Recipe for Hot Rhubarb
programme.desc: Kate tries to teach Betty Jo how to make hot rhubarb after setting her up on a double date. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired November 12, 1963.

programme.title: Six Gun Trail
programme.desc: Legendary cowboy star Tim McCoy stars as Captain William Carson, who along with his sidekick Magpie does battle with jewel thieves. Its an actionfilled drama of the West, with plenty of blazing guns and heman adventure! There are a couple of songs, too, including Moon Over the Plains but they arent sung by Tim McCoy. He was too darned tough to sing! Also starring Nora Lane, Ben Corbet; directed by Sam Newfield.

programme.title: Enemy of the Law
programme.desc: Tex Ritter stars in this western drama about a man who goes undercover to befriend a convict believed to have stolen a shipment of government gold. Also starring Guy Wilkerson as Panhandle Perkins, this offering from Hollywoods Poverty Row features the usual fistfights and entertaining storyline that made these modestly budgeted features well worth watching. Songs include Teach Me To Forget and You Will Have to Pay both sung by Tex!

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Baseball superstar Gehrig is one of several ranchers being coerced by a bunch of bandits. His sister and her lawyer/lover organize the ranchers. Directed by Ray Taylor; starring Smith Ballew, Gehrig, Evelyn Knapp. Talk about stunt casting! Gehrig was a New York Yankees star who was nearing the end of his career, but one of the biggest sports stars in the country. In the movie he plays a variation of himself, as Lou Gehrig, a retired baseball player who takes up ranching. Lou expects to relax on his ranch but quickly joins other ranchers in a fight to protect their properties.

programme.title: Man from Utah
programme.desc: WHIRLING ROPES AND SNARLING GUNS IN THE GALLOPING GRIP OF A GLAMOROUS DRAMA! John Wayne stars as John Weston, a man hired to investigate shady doings at a local rodeo. It seems all the riders who are on the verge of winning end up dead. Along with Wayne, this tale of action on the range also stars the usual Lone Star Picture stock company, including Gabby Hayes and Yakima Canutt!

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.title: Fighting Caravans
programme.desc: Clint Belmet (Gary Cooper) is a frontier scout with his hands full in this 1931 Paramount Pictures version of Zane Grey's novel. He's helping guide a wagon train across the country, fighting off various attacks on the way, and falling for his lovely Felice (Lily Damita). Belmet's grizzled companions think he should leave the woman alone, but it gets lonely out on the trail, and Felice's charms are hard to resist. Featuring such notable character actors of the period as Ernest Torrence, Tully Marshall, and Fred Kolher, this vintage Hollywood Western still packs a wallop!

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days' work for him. It's not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Hit the Saddle
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers get involved when a local sheriff is killed in this B-western from Republic Pictures. The trouble starts when a villainous rancher (J.P. McGowan) plots to steal some government protected horses. Bob Livingstone, Max Terhune, and Ray Corrigan star as the gallant Mesquiteers, while a young Rita Hayworth (Gilda, The Lady From Shanghai) appears as a sexy saloon singer who turns a Mesquiteer's head.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tensions rise as a range war over water seems inevitable. A masked man dressed as Robin Hood tries to help the homesteaders by knocking down the ranchers fences. Things seem to be going well until a similarly dressed imposter robs the Diablo bank.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was niominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A member of Teddy Roosevelts Roughriders returns to Diablo to take the valuable land he had been promised. When he arrives, he discovers that the land is part of an Indian reservation. Things quickly turn from bad to worse when a corrupt land agent frames the man for murdering a brave with the hope of inciting an Indian war, which he will use for his own desires for the valuable land. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Diablo is in danger when a gang of hired killers comes to town. Lofty finds himself conflicted as he is reluctant to take on the gang once he discovers the leader rescued him back in their days in the U.S. Cavalry. With the state senator possibly the target of the gang, the townspeople call for Lofty to resign amid his reluctance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primtetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley

This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: The bank is robbed and the sheriff is killed while everyone is distracted by the wedding between Sand Creeks newspaper editor and a beautiful brunette. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley

Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tagg Oakley finds himself in trouble after being tricked into driving a wagon full of gunpowder to Fort Yuma, unaware that Geronimo and his Apache braves are waiting for the wagon to pass. Realizing Tagg is in danger, Annie and Lofty race to the rescue. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie writes to the son of an old female pedlar, unaware that he is a member of an outlaw gang, now on their way to Diablo. programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 The Saga of Clement O' Toole
programme.desc: Mistaken for a notorious outlaw, a young man struggles to convince the townspeople that he didnt commit a stagecoach robbery. Initially, Annie and Susan Meriwether believe him, but his innocence comes into question when he is present during a bank robbery in which the outlaws seem to recognize him. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. programme.desc: With the sheriff off looking for an outlaw, a fake sheriff takes his place, leading to a senseless murder. programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A town blames the son-in-law of a the bank president for his murder. Cisco and Pancho work to uncover the truth before the townspeople hang the man. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951

This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: Kentucky Rifle
programme.desc: His Wits, Weapons and Women, Turned Defeat Into Victory! A man brings a wagonload of Kentucky rifles through Indian Territory. Unfortunately the Indians realize what he has and offer the travelers an ultimatum: the rifles or their lives! Starring Lance Fuller, Sterling Holloway, Henry Hull, Chill Wills, Cathy Downs, and Jeanne Cagney, plus one of the great B-Western heels, I. Stanford Jolley!

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. You'll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Wayne's big swinging' right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Wayne's...

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid, Pat Garrett, and Doc Holliday ride again in Howard Hughes' epic 1943 western, but the character you'll remember most is sultry country vixen Rio McDonald. Hughes' nationwide search for an actress to play Rio resulted in the film debut of Jane Russell, whose natural assets were allegedly helped by a special bra designed by Hughes. When The Outlaw finally received a nationwide release in 1946, its success vindicated Hughes and made Russell a star. As for Hughes' infamous bra, Russell said in her 1988 memoir, I never wore it, and he never knew.

programme.title: Outpost In Morocco
programme.desc: George Raft, Mary Windsor, and Akim Tamiroff star in this romantic drama from director Robert Florey (The Florentine Dagger, Daughter of Shanghai). Raft plays Capt. Gerard, a member of the Foreign Legion known for his romantic entanglements. He's assigned to escort an emir's daughter to her father's mountain citadel and learn about the emir's activities. Not surprisingly, Gerard finds trouble brewing! With footage shot in Morocco, this movie also features a beautiful musical score by twotime Oscar nominee Michel Michelet (Voice in the Wind).

programme.title: The Range Busters
programme.desc: In the first of the Range Buster series, a mysterious figure is killing the help at the Circle T Ranch. The Range Busters are called in to help, but cant figure out the murderers identity. Is it Torrence, a longtime rival of the Circle T, or is it blind uncle Rolph? Ray Crash Corrigan, John Dusty King, and Alibi Max Terhune head the cast. Director S. Roy Luby (Border Phantom, Black Market Rustlers), also has a fine list of supporting players, including Luana Walters, Leroy Mason, and Kermit Maynard.

programme.title: Hawk of the Hills
programme.desc: A band of Indians led by the Hawk terrorizes prospectors in a valley. HAWK OF THE HILLS was originally released as a ten episode serial in 1927 but was re-edited into a five-reel feature (the version presented here) in 1929.

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, sent by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In Mysterious Decoy, Pat and Stony get involved with the famous half-way house that settled the Utah-Arizona boundary. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the boys rout out Ole Gimpy's ghost.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction

Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Luck O' The Irish

In this episode, Judge Roy and Taggart are intrigued by the arrival of Pat O'Hara and his much younger wife Kate. Pat's fondess for drink and gambling has him involved with the town's rowdies who are eying his beautiful bride. The Judge helps sort things out.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A man asserts that he has a Royal Grant that gives him ownership of the entire town.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in November, 1957.

Episode originally aired in December, 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe teaches sign language to a beautiful deaf girl, but finds himself in trouble when the girls neighbor becomes jealous of the attention Little Joe is receiving from the girl.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Days of Jesse James
programme.desc: Famed American western actor and singer Roy Rogers once again plays himself in this Jesse James tale that's a twist on the familiar formula. When he is summoned to bring Jesse to justice after the known villain is suspected of a bank robbery, Rogers soon discovers that Jesse has been framed and that the owner of the bank has robbed his own bank posing as Jesse. Fast-paced and fun, this classic Roy Rogers western directed by Joseph Kane (Dakota) features a whole host of original songs sung by the great Rogers himself.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid, along with Pancho, try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: Lights of Old Santa Fe
programme.desc: Roy Rogers gets involved when his buddy finds himself at odds with a rival rodeo operator. There's plenty of singing in this musical western, plus enough action to make you realize that Roy Rogers was much more than a singing cowboy! With a cast that includes Dale Evans, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Lloyd Corrigan, and Tom Keene, director Frank McDonald gives us a fun thrill ride through old Santa Fe. Trigger is here, too!

programme.title: Cowboy And The Prizefighter
programme.desc: Red Ryder takes Steve Stevenson, who has saved his life, to his ranch and gives him a job. Red's aunt, the Duchess, knew Steve's father, who supposedly committed suicide after losing his ranch betting on a prizefight. Steve refuses to believe that his father took his own life, suspecting he was murdered. Red and Little Beaver aid Steve in finding his father killer.

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trailblazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) battles Shawnee warriors as he leads a band of settlers into Kentucky in this frontier potboiler from Albert C. Gannaway Productions. Made at the height of Hollywood's fascination with pioneer days, the film also stars Lon Chaney Jr. as Chief Blackfish, and country singer Faron Young as a handsome young suitor for Boone's daughter. There's plenty of action and danger here as the Shawnee are convinced that Boone is trying to steal their land. But Boone is ready, not even fearing death by tomahawk. It isn't how you die, Boone says. It's what you live for.

programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western. He and George Gabby Hayes strike it rich with a gold mine, only to find their lives complicated by women and crooked officials. Things get even messier when the good guys are framed for murder! Its all action here, particularly since legendary stuntman Yakima Cannut stars as one of the films heavies. Who will win the fight over the gold and the girl? Directed by Robert N. Bradbury for Monogram Pictures. Also starring Barbara Sheldon. (The film was also known as Gold Strike River.)

programme.title: Król niewiernych
programme.desc: Młody chłopak chce ocalić swoje państwo przed okrutnymi najeźdźcami.

programme.title: Tucker: Konstruktor Marzeń
programme.desc: Konstruktor tworzy rewolucyjne projekty samochodów, które wstrząsają całym przemysłem motoryzacyjnym.

programme.title: Bodom
programme.desc: Czwórka nastolatków wybiera się nad jezioro Bodom, by odtworzyć scenę brutalnego morderstwa sprzed lat.

programme.title: Człowiek niedźwiedź
programme.desc: W tym pasjonującym filmie dokumentalnym znany reżyser, Werner Herzog, opowiada o życiu i śmierci badacza-amatora niedźwiedzi grizzly i obrońcy przyrody, Timothy'ego Treadwella, który 13 lat spędził, bez broni, pośród tych niedźwiedzi.

programme.title: Zostań
programme.desc: Pacjent ze skłonnościami samobójczymi głosi dziwaczne przepowiednie, które – ku rosnącemu przerażeniu jego psychiatry – zaczynają się spełniać. Lekarz rozpoczyna wyścig z czasem, aby uratować to, co kocha, zanim wszystko zniknie.

programme.title: Uuu! Halloween Madei
programme.desc: Aby uniknąć kłopotów w wigilię Wszystkich Świętych, Madea i jej paczka zostają w domu, aby mieć oko na nastoletnią córkę Briana. Ale kiedy nadchodzi godzina czarownic, rozpętuje się piekło.

programme.title: Ares
programme.desc: Francja przyszłości. Władze próbują zapobiec buntowi głodujących ludzi, oferując im brutalny program telewizyjny z udziałem ich samych.

programme.title: Heat - Gorączka
programme.desc: Neil McCauley (Robert De Niro), złodziej wysokiej rangi, wzbił się na szczyt kariery dzięki inteligencji, czujności oraz byciu nieuchwytnym. Detektyw Vince Hanna (Al Pacino) jest niezawodny w swoim fachu i tym razem wziął na swój cel McCauleya.

programme.title: Tajemnice Los Angeles
programme.desc: Trzech detektywów Jack Vincennes (Kevin Spacey), Bud White (Russell Crowe) oraz Ed Exley (Guy Pearce) łączą swoje siły, aby rozwiązać zagadkę seryjnych morderstw popełnionych przez gang. Otacza ich zarówno prestiżowa, jak i mroczna strona przemysłu filmowego.

programme.title: Birdman
programme.desc: Riggan Thomson (Michael Keaton) postanawia wystawić na Broadwayu sztukę. Ma nadzieję, że to pomoże mu wskrzesić karierę, którą zbudował na roli kinowego superbohatera.

programme.title: W zasięgu strzału
programme.desc: Liberty, żona producenta broni, zostaje porwana przez mężczyznę imieniem Joe. Celem Joego jest pomścić córkę, która zginęła w strzelaninie w szkole, a za winnych tej tragedii uznaje twórców broni użytej w tym celu.

programme.title: Blood Brother
programme.desc: Jake trafia do więzienia, chroniąc swoich przyjaciół. W międzyczasie jego najlepszy kumpel, Chris, wyrywa się z przestępczego świata i zostaje policjantem. Gdy po 15 latach Jake wychodzi na wolność, rozpoczyna krwawą wendettę.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: ASSASSIN'S CREED to spajająca światy opowieść o mężczyźnie, który znajduje się w centrum antycznej wojny pomiędzy dwoma potężnymi sektami – tylko poprzez wykorzystanie wspomnień swojego przodka, które znajdują się w jego DNA, jest w stanie zakończyć konflikt i domagać się swojego odkupienia.

programme.title: Kelnerzy
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds występuje w tej przezabawnej komedii o grupie kelnerów i kelnerek poszukujących sensu życia podczas oczekiwania na kolejny duży napiwek.

programme.title: Operacja: Zemsta
programme.desc: Kiedy były żołnierz dowiaduje się o śmierci swojego najlepszego przyjaciela, postanawia dotrzeć do prawdy i wymierzyć sprawiedliwość winnym. stanowi jedynie część wielkiego spisku. Teraz będzie musiał po kolei eliminować sprawców.

programme.title: Sex Drive
programme.desc: Nastolatek rozpaczliwie, chcący stracić dziewictwo, przekonuje swoich przyjaciół, żeby pojechali z nim w podróż, aby mógł spotkać się z dziewczyną poznaną przez internet, ale wycieczka szybko zmienia się w serię zabawnych wpadek.

programme.title: Ares
programme.desc: Francja przyszłości. Władze próbują zapobiec buntowi głodujących ludzi, oferując im brutalny program telewizyjny z udziałem ich samych.

programme.title: Klub samotnych mam
programme.desc: Grupa samotnych matek z różnych środowisk łączy się i tworzy grupę wsparcia, gdzie mogą omówić swoje problemy, znaleźć radość w przeszkodach życiowych i wykorzystać swoją wewnętrzną siłę, aby pokonać osobiste wyzwania.

programme.title: Cook Off!
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthy, wraz z innymi geniuszami komedii, występuje w zabawnym mockumencie o zagorzałej walce w świecie konkursów cukierniczych.

programme.title: Podziemny krąg
programme.desc: Oparta na debiutanckiej powieści Chucka Palanhiuka historia o zagubionym młodym mężczyźnie z niedalekiej przyszłości. Nie mając rodziny ani przyjaciół, często odwiedza grupy wsparcia dla chorych w celu tworzenia więzi z innymi.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Paranoiczny thriller w kosmosie, który podąża za Royem McBride'em w misji przez bezlitosny układ słoneczny, aby odkryć prawdę o jego zaginionym ojcu i jego skazanej na wyprawę wyprawie, która teraz, 30 lat później, zagraża wszechświatowi.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Charlie (Terrence J) to kawaler przekonany, że związki nie mają sensu, mimo że jego siostra i zarazem terapeutka (Paula Patton) oraz przyjaciele próbują przekonać go, że nie ma racji.

programme.title: Operacja: Zemsta
programme.desc: Kiedy były żołnierz dowiaduje się o śmierci swojego najlepszego przyjaciela, postanawia dotrzeć do prawdy i wymierzyć sprawiedliwość winnym. stanowi jedynie część wielkiego spisku. Teraz będzie musiał po kolei eliminować sprawców.

programme.title: Co się zdarzyło w Las Vegas
programme.desc: Dwójka nieznajomych, którzy po pijanemu biorą ślub w Vegas, walczą o fortunę po tym, jak sędzia odrzuca ich wniosek o rozwód.

programme.title: Przekleństwo Jeremy'ego
programme.desc: Nieśmiały i słabo rozwinięty młody człowiek o niesamowitych umiejętnościach uczy się radzenia sobie z życiem w małym skorumpowanym mieście.

programme.title: Król niewiernych
programme.desc: Młody chłopak chce ocalić swoje państwo przed okrutnymi najeźdźcami.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: ASSASSIN'S CREED to spajająca światy opowieść o mężczyźnie, który znajduje się w centrum antycznej wojny pomiędzy dwoma potężnymi sektami – tylko poprzez wykorzystanie wspomnień swojego przodka, które znajdują się w jego DNA, jest w stanie zakończyć konflikt i domagać się swojego odkupienia.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: Wierna żona jest rozwścieczona krętactwami swego męża, gdy staje się jasne, że ją zdradził.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Thriller Science Ficition to skok w inny wymiar. JUMPER to opowieść o niezwykłych przygodach człowieka, który odkrywa, że ma ekscytującą zdolność teleportowania się, gdziekolwiek tylko zechce.

programme.title: Co się zdarzyło w Las Vegas
programme.desc: Dwójka nieznajomych, którzy po pijanemu biorą ślub w Vegas, walczą o fortunę po tym, jak sędzia odrzuca ich wniosek o rozwód.

programme.title: Destrukcja: Los Angeles (Destruction: Los Angeles)
programme.desc: Siejąca śmierć eksplozja wulkanu i największe trzęsienie ziemi w Los Angeles niszczy całe miasto i dziesiątkuje jego populację. Najlepszy lokalny reporter John Benson wykorzystuje szansę, by opowiedzieć historię miasta od wewnątrz, starając się znaleźć rodzinę zagubioną w chaosie.

programme.title: W zasięgu strzału
